Great Camera with a great picture! Ease of use and clarity is great. I couldn't ask for better. Price was right!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera for What I Use it For
Item.Review: I needed a camera that had 10x or better optical zoom but was still a pocket camera, and it needed to have a mix of point-and-shoot and quasi-professional features. I use it for high-resolution covers for audio CD cases, family photos, and for web-page content. This one works extremely well in all lighting situations. It gives you as much or as little control as you want over image size in pixels, manual or automatic settings, etc. On rare occasions when I use the digital zoom, the ability to select a 14 Megapixel image file means that cropped photos still have excellent resolution. This camera's ability to shoot at extremely close range is also a plus. And the price was right. The PDF manual is very well organized and easy to understand. I would recommend it to anyone who needs a quality ... pocket camera. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The camera is very attractive and the body is well designed. Battery life is excellent. However, the picture quality of flash pictures is very grainy. My old 5MP camera's flash pictures are sharper. Also, there is a substantial delay between shots when using the flash which results in lost opportunities.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This camera is capable not only of taking beautiful pictures but also great videos! I have taken pictures that I needed the zoom for, and they come out as clear as if I was standing there. II use it for everything as it is small enough for mmy pocket and easy to operate.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: As every other Sony camera, image quality is great. It's a very good point and shoot camera with 10x zoom and 14MP. It would have been great if it would have viewfinder as well, but you can live without it. Easy to operate and carry! Thanksgiving deal made it an easy option to purchase

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera, easy to use, so many features!
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use, great pictures.
Cons: haven't found anything wrong with it yet.
Really love this camera! Great for the price. The pictures are clear, even in a darker room. I rarely need the flash. The panoramic feature is cool. Highly recommend it.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact for a 10X Camera
Cons: Pictures with too much motion and/or blur
It is simply impossible to get consistently good pictures.
About half the time they have blur, motion streaks. When they do not have motion, they are not sharp or clear, dark. I am very dissapointed since I was lookig for a compact camera, with high zoom, lightweight and not too bulky, but it simply does not consistently take good pictures.
Pros are that it has good video recording with good sound and I like the panoramic feature.
Unfortunalety I will return.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The zoom ratio was my primary motivator for this purchase. Pixel rating was an incentive also. The features for manual settings(shutter speed and the like)seems decent, although not all that familiar w/ it. Ease of use for the standard operations was pretty much the norm and performed rather smoothly.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 10X Zoom, SDHC or Memory Stick storage options
Cons: On a 1-10 scale battery life is a 5.5 so buy a spare battery
This camera was purchased as a replacement for a Sony DSC5 that finally gave up the ghost after nearly 6 years of use. I was specifically looking for a H-20 but those are hard to come by and this is the obvious successor (albeit smaller and slightly less capable). Picture quality is good especially when using 'pet mode' . The 10X zoom was the big selling point and works well.
I've read some negative reviews of this camera and can only say this: Never base your opinion of a new product on any failure of performance within the first month or so. That one item (or group of shipped items) may have suffered a catastrophic event in handling prior to purchas ... e. If you purchase from stores like BestBuy or Target or Walmart the return/replacement policy will give you at least one more chance on which to base a more accurate opinion. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Complicated; needs a class in the use of it.
Item.Review:
Pros: Panorama shots possible.
Cons: Learning how to use the features.
I like the panorama feature. The camera itself is complicated so I have not had much success with it. It is certainly versatile; takes stills, movies and panoramas. It has much promise.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: High resolution, great zoom, reasonable price
Cons: Too many modes, shutter lag, red-eye flash leaves shadows
I bought this to replace my 4 year old Kodak - I was looking for more megapixels and a better zoom lens in a compact camera. The camera takes very sharp pictures (with one exception - see below), and the zoom lens is great (10X). The camera has many different modes, including full manual, "Easy", program mode, and something called Intellegent Auto Adjust - too many for most users. The casual user will never need them all - I'm still tying to learn what they are after 3 weeks. The Intellegent Auto Adjust mode has a red-eye reduction flash that seemed to leave shadows of the subject on the image - I changed to the Program mode and the problem went away. There is a ... noticeable lag between pressing the shutter and seeing the picture in the view finder - somewhat annoying. Also, realize that the "10X" zoom is not really 10X, since the camera starts at a wide ange (which is nice) - the actual zoom from normal view is about 8X. All in all I'm very pleased with the camera - a good buy. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: So faf I love this camera
Item.Review: I really enjoyed this camera. The images are excellent. The Sweep Pan feature is a great feature, I will use it over and over again. I would recommend this camera to anyone, it fits into my shirt pocket.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Incredibly easy touse and get high quality results
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
Cons: nothing
the auto scene selection makes this camera very easy to use and get great results. HD movie mode plays back great on my HD TV. Steady shot feature is the best.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: My husband and I got this camera and really love using it. Picture quality is very good and the special features rock (we have gotten so many pan. shots!) Can be a little complicate to navagate the first time using it. Long battery life. Only thing we aren't crazy about is that the time betwen pictures is a bit long.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Quailty and Ease
Cons: software
I go to lots of Nascar races and sit front row so getting great pictures are very hard. This camera was very easy to use and my pictures are excellent quality even the picture on the LCD is great. I am not to fond of the software but I am getting use to it so it is getting easier.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: everything, esp. the manual setting
Cons: nothing so far
I bought this camera for twos reasons. One I needed a new camera and two I needed a new camera that took good pictures at concerts. I bought the camera last Wednesday and I went to the American Idol concert last Saturday. Before the concert I messed around with the camera and loved it. But I told myself that if this doesn't work well at the concert, I'm returning it. Lucky enough it worked wonderful at the concert. The Manual setting is wonderful. Having that feature on the camera made my concert so worth it. I had 3rd and got some amazing pictures.
oh and the video setting takes amazing videos. I took 3 videos at the concert and the sound and picture is so clear.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great camera even for a beginner
Item.Review: I was really nervous. I bought this camera 2 days before heading to Hawaii. I had no time to practice or even charge the battery. Took great pictures, no problem. My only complaint was the owner's manual for anything advanced was on CD. I thought I would read on the plane. I didn't know how to operate Panoramic or other features.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: This little camera can DO BIG THINGS
Item.Review: This camera never ceases to amaze me. I have owned it about 2 months and I have taken over 1200 pictures under all circumstances. I carry it with me everywhere. I am a serious amateur photographer who owns 3 digital cameras, and has owned many more. I take hundreds of pictures a month, and my specialty is journal photography of events and nature shots(lots of indoor, outdoor and macro shots). The image stabilization is incredible (supposedly double stabilization). I got great shots from a moving boat of moving skier. The wide angle (35mm equivalent f 25mm, yes 25mm) is so convenient for indoors and scenic shots. The flash looks so tiny yet can fill a room even a wide angle. It can do automatic scene selection almost perfectly, face recognition too. It goes to macro mode with no se ... tting change. The 10X optical zoom is smooth and accurate, and with IS I have gotten incredible hand held pictures. If you take a lots of pictures, get a spare battery (under $10 on line). You will love this camera. I hope this one lasts A LONG TIME. Bob in Florida expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: HD videos and quality pics
Cons: none
After shopping around and looking at many cameras, this one has it all and I got it for a great price. You get to choose how big you want your pictures and videos to come out. HD videos and overall picture quality…!!!
Take this camera in your next vacation...!!!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use...right out of the box.
Cons: Battery life. But, I did use it all day, so not so bad!!
This was a great camera for my trip. It is easy to use and the features are great. I think the best feature is the panoramic option....great pictures! Glad the bundle included an extra battery. Battery last for a good day, but you will need a backup. This is the only negative to this great camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: The camera features are cool and the panoramic Sony feature is wonderful. Video clips made up pretty nice (720p). The only thing that I notice about that it is a little bit slow when shooting serial pictures (one by one on short intervals).

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 14.1M and all the features oh and 720 video WOW
Cons: nothing that I know of.
I bought my camera at the end of June and it was lost/stolen at the airport by the 4th of July weekend. I loved my camera and was looking forward to taking it with me to Afghanistan. The features were just what I was looking for in a smaller camera. I love that you can use the manual exposer and the easy panoramic shot. I just wish we had a little more time to be together. :-(

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought this particular model because it used the same memory card and battery as my other camera, but is much, much smaller for when I want to just grab a camera for small trips or random use. I found out that this camera had more than I expected than just a small, fit-in-you-pocket size. I love the panorama setting! I've used it several times now and it's so convenient! I used to have to paste together a series of pictures in photoshop if I wanted an extended shot, now I just click, sweep, and upload my pics!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Have had 4 excellent Sony cameras and this is the best of all. Incredibly low price for the many features and quality of the camera. I thoroughly researched to find the camera I wanted and found this at a bottom low price. Just returned fron a vacation trip with my children and took over 500 photos with excellent results in all different types of situations.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: User friendly and clarity is excellent
Great camera for a beginner. Excellent clarity and user friendly. Can take images as well as video. I have used 8 GB memory card hence its good for both video & camera

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Not quite as good as I had expected.
Item.Review: In the Intelligent Auto Adjust mode it tends to wash out objects in bright sunlight...often times I have to manually lower the brightness setting. Sometimes it seems that the pictures are not as crisp as they should be...almost as if it is not in correct focus. (I am careful not to take the picture until I get the green light.)

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I bought this camera right before visiting San Francisco, California. My favorite features are the panoramic and auto-focus(not sure about the name). It automatically recognizes what setting the camera should be on (landscape, back light, nighttime...etc). The panoramic is AWESOME... I absolutely love hanging pictures and I took one of the Giants baseball stadium... it looks professional. I plan on blowing it up and hanging it in my house somewhere!!! The zoom is also incredible. We we sitting pretty high up in the stadium and I could zoom in enough to see facial features of the players. You will have NO regrets!!!!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, great zoom, wonderful picture quality.
Cons: Battery life is on the short side.
I have always had Kodak camera's...I loved my kodak camara that I got from my parents as a graduation gift. So four years later when the camera stopped working clearly. I went straight to kodak's website and chose a camera. My husband surprised me with the camera I wanted. Well from day one the camera's picture were poor, the camera froze up all the time and was just awful. After several month I took it to best buy and they tried repairing it three times. Finally they gave me a store credit and I was able to choose another camera. Well I wasnt sure what I wanted and the sales associate asked what I wanted I told her I wanted something to take awesome pictures but that wasnt as b ... ig and expensive as a DSLR. She took me right to the Sony Cybershot and I fell in love. It takes awesome pictures, easy to use and the panaroma feature is so awesome!!! Love the camera! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: 10x optical
Cons: panorama mode needs more develoupment to improve image quality.
10x optical gives great pictures at any distance. the panorama mode is really neat, i gave picture quality as 4 stars because that feature doesn't have great quality, but what can you expect with a new feature, it works good though. regular pictures have great quality. over all a really great camera, especially for the price tag

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, and takes wonderful pictures
Cons: Only thing is dial for settings will turn while in pocket so you have to make sure setting is still correct
I just got this camera a month ago and took it on vacation to Spain. It takes wonderful pictures with great ease and I didn't have to do a lot of fiddling with settings. It's lightweight and easy to carry and when you have neck arthritis it helps to not have a heavy camera around your neck. Only drawback it that the dial for the picture settings turns easily so you have to be sure to check settings when you get it out of pocket or camera pouch. Otherwise, it's a wonderful deal.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use, good price, great pictures
Cons: Battery life could be longer
I received this camera for Mothers Day and I absolutely love it. Every time I use it I find something else new about it. I usually go with Kodak cameras but thought we would try something new and the gentlemen at Best Buy was very helpful and recommended this camera and we couldn't be happier, we absolutely love this camera. We have used it for kids sports, a Twins game, etc.. It doesn't matter if it is light or dark it works great.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I replaced my aging point and shoot camera with this Sony. It is fantastic. The Sweep Panorama feature is so nice and takes a really wide angle. Pictures are clear and crisp, the level of detail that can be achieved is amazing. The face and smile detection features are very accurate and make snapping a few quick pics a breeze. I have owned it less than a month and my friends are already buying the same camera when they see the results. Have yet to find any drawbacks.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Love the 10x zoom and panorama features
Cons: slow on time between shots
I am very satisfied with this camera! The panorama feature is great, so easy to use and very cool play back that pans left to right exactly as you shot it. Really like the small size and 10x zoom. Also, using the "Easy" mode without flash gives me pretty bright shots in dim light situations - much better than another camera a family member was using side by side.
My only complaint, and it's a minor one: the "reload" time between shots is a little slow. Otherwise, this camera has been fantastic.
I'd buy it again!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: OK Auto Focus Camera for Under $300.00
Item.Review:
Pros: Awesome Daylight Pics
Cons: VERY POOR low light pics
I am hard on cameras, had 4 in the last 8 yrs. I like the AUTO cameras, the more it does in automatic the better for me, I'm NOT a professional photographer This camera has a Intelligent auto mode which I tried outside and inside my home during daylight hours, it worked awesome ! great pics!, then I took it to my 17 yr. old daughter's high school Senior Ring Ceremony in a dimly lit auditorium , in the Intelligent auto mode in low light I didn't get any of the ONCE IN A LIFETIME shots I bought the camera for, pics were so blurred they weren't worth keeping. The camera took too long to focus, & shoot again. The manual said that in the I-Auto mode , it would shoot anywhere, anytime, auto adjust for scene selection ... . I thought it would do just that, that's why I bought it in the first place!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use, you just turn it on and go. It automatically adjusts in ANY setting even the living room with just a lamp.
Cons: Battery life seems short but I may not have charged it all the way.
Ths camera is the best camera I have ever owned. All you do is turn it on and shoot. It even takes great pcitures in the livingroom with nothing but a lamp for light. I'm not at all electronics savy and this camera works great for me. The panormaic shot mode is awesome.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great product, though a bit bulky
Item.Review:
Overall this is a great camera and much better than my previous Sony camera. I had compared this camera to others and even experts at retailers were telling me this is a better camera.
The HD movie feature with zoom is great though, the sounds is recorded in "mono" as oppose to "stereo" mode.
The pictures are very good and the iAuto scene selection feature is quite impressive. It automatically detects the scene and picks the appropriate setting.
The panarama feature is nice though the details of the picture can be fuzzy.
Overall, this is a good buy and I recommend it.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Great picture quality, zoom, easy to use
Cons: The red light when flash isn't on
This is my third digital camera in 3.5 years. The first one I got was when I didn't know anything about digital cameras and it was only 6gb. I sold it and bought a Kodak M1093 IS that worked amazingly but after a while I noticed things about it I did not like, and then 2 weeks ago I bought this camera. I was focusing on mp when I bought this camera and picture quality as well as zoom. So far this camera has done wonders and I have really enjoyed it. I'm 22 years old and in college and working a full time job so when I am not busy, I am pretty much always taking pictures. Yes, in the future I would love to upgrade to more of a professional camera, but for now, this is just what I need. The p ... icture quality is amazing and it just what I want. I definitely reccomend it for anyone who wants to capture all the moments in their life. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: My sony cyber-shot camera is great.
Item.Review:
Pros: Good Value; Charges Quickly; Reliable Performance; Long Lasting
My original purchase included a back-up battery. It would not charge. Buydig replaced the faulty battery. Once shipped, the replacement battery arrived in a few days. It charged overnight and has been working well. Thanks buydig for replacing the faulty battery, no questions asked..

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Good Image Quality
This camera has an excellent Optical 10X zoom, images can be seen clearly and with rich colours. Also using the 20X digital zoom photos have many details, you can apreciate like lines in a wall or symbols in a stone. 720p video looks great when played in my laptop and it does not have blur or moving lines like in other camera's brands, thanks for the mp4 format, very, very portable. Nice panoramic photos, I use them as wallpapers. Only one thing I couldn't do with this camera was shooting the moon or filming it, may be I have to read the manual with more calm. SD Cards supported, nice move!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Mega Zoom; Flawless Finish; great
Cons: Focusing takes a while
So far the camera is great. Since it is a Sony I expect it to last for a while. It looks amazing and the pictures are fantastic.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: finally i got something that gives me great pictures with both daylight and night modes. I can still say this camera is compact inspite of the 14X zoom it provides, sweep panaroma moode is an added advantage (not sure how much that helps for quality photos). Just get used to the right modes and settings, and u will have the best pics out of these for you favourite albums.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: the sharpness of the pictures
Cons: the size is a bit big
The Sony camera is very easy to use and takes beautiful pictures. Even at full zoom, the pictures are sharp and clear.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: This is, beyond a shadow of doubt, the nicest little camera I have owned to date. I have owned at least 7 digi cameras over that last 15 years of varying degrees of technology - This is on the top of the list. The zoom is amazing. the panoramic feature is impressive. The clarity of each pic is astounding. It is so easy to get perfect results! BRAVO!!!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: The grip and reputation of the Sony name brand
Cons: have no complaints so far
My choice was between a Canon and the Sony Camera. What helped my decision was the grip of this Sony camera. I think it is important to have a comfortable fitting camera. I'm quite happy with picture quality and menu selection. This is our first quality digital camera so we don't have too much experience as other writers and nothing to really compare it to. So far so good. It sure is easier using these smaller cameras compared to our former 35 mm that used film. Therefore, we have no complaints. I tried the Canon but it felt like it would have just fallen right out of my hands.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: I would purchase this all over again if had to
Item.Review:
Pros: awesome camera with all the features you will ever need
Cons: zoom button is decent for men's fingers
I love this camera...Have had nothing but awesome pictures from it...many awesome options for such a small camera. Only thing I'm not excited about is the zoom button. These small cameras are great, but really are not made for men. Most men have big fingers & even though this is the best one that I found for this situation, it's still not ideal. Not to say I wouldn't purchase this camera again, cause I would in a heart beat.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Camera gives very good and clear pictures. Good for indoor and generic outdoor photography... The add-ons that come with the package is a good deal for the money. The Tripod could have been a little bigger. Though it is good shaky hands to get perfect pics, not really good for others.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Stunning and fast and uses SD cards!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy, quick, high quality, durable, panoramic
Cons: Only 720p video, proprietary data cable, external charger
This camera was bought for a specific purpose. I went to New York and wanted something that could stand up to the rigors of shooting 200+ pictures a day and be able to be small and also have 10x optical zoom and a high pixel count.
I bought an extra battery for this purpose and it worked out great and my pictures are absolutely stunning.
Sometimes when shooting in low light with the flash off, if you're not used to the camera it takes blurry shots. I had someone take a picture of me inside that had never taken a picture before with this camera and that shot was ruined. Too bad I can't get it done over again.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Very good product. Takes great pictures!
Item.Review: I like this camera for the ease of use and it makes great pictures. We are using it for video too, and during the day it makes great videos. But I haven't figured out yet, if there is a way to record video at night. Otherwise good picture quality, clear and sharp pictures.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera easy to use, high quality
Item.Review:
Pros: Battery life
Cons: Didn't come with a carry case
Point and shoot, thats the best part of it. Very easy to use, and the battery lasts a long time. This camera replaced a camera where I had to replace a battery every time I used it or charge batteries after every use, this camera is awesome, have owned it for 1 month and haven't had to recharge the battery yet. Highly recommend this camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: The camera is a very good compact unit.
Item.Review:
Pros: compact and easy to use
We bought the camera for our daughter and she really likes it! It has some amazing features and she is playing with it all the time. She broke her old camera several months ago and was using her phone for pictures.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: I was surprised at how much I love this camera. You definitely need to use the manual but it was easy to use and read. One time through and I had it! The video's are crisp and the pics wonderful. The hardest part was figuring out the camera to computer to Facebook. I got it!

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Awesome Picture quality + good deal for the bundle
Item.Review: I bought this as gift for my girl friend's mom and she loved it, Personally my favorite is the Sweep Panorama mode. It has good picture quality and very useful features like bracketing for somebody who needs more than a basic P&S camera.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Overall it's a great camera with a good picture quality. The 10x zoom is amazing. The only thing is the shutter delay; it takes several seconds more (compared with other cameras) to take the picture. However, once you get accustomed it doesn't really bother.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Camera, Good Quality Pictures & Videos
Item.Review:
Pros: HD Video
Cons: Nothing
I bought this camera for my daughter's birthday. She loves it! It's easy to use and takes great quality stills and HD video. Can't beat it for the price! Can't beat Sony products for vesatility. We only buy Sony Digital Cameras.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent pictures, 10x optical zoom, panorama capability
Cons: Haven't found any negatives yet.
Purchased this camera while waiting for my Nikon D3100 to arrive. I wanted to capture pictures of Thanksgiving Day. I was amazed at the quality of the pictures and the zoom capabilities. The panoramic scene is great. I have attached 2 pictures taken, one with zoom and the other using panorama. The zoom picture was taken of a stop sign a block away while standing on my porch. The car in the driveway was so close using the zoom. I am not disappointed with my purchase. The negative reviews are just that, negative. The camera is easy to operate and has some nice features so a beginning can use it right out of the box.

Item.Item: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
Item.Review: Originally ordered the Sony WX-5 and sent it back. This camera DSC-H55 is every bit as good and with the BuyDig package got a spare battery and case for $100 LESS !! Camera is compact and easy to use. Can be used Manually or Automatically and seems to have good battery life. So far my only problem is the software provided for downloading pictures, they download but still having some minor problems with sorting them, E-mailing them, etc. The camera itself though is GREAT !!
